ComicInfo.Summary:
Sonja is hired by Lady Rosenda to recover a trove of valuables from the raiders who stole them. She is promised that, if she does so, she will be allowed to keep the Sword of Aurora for herself.
When Red Sonja returns with a tiara she was sent for by King Ghannif she learns her "reward" is to be made a part of his harem.
ComicInfo.Title: Red Sonja
ComicInfo.Inker: Mel Rubi,Neal Adams,Ernie Chan,Mel Rubi,Neal Adams,Ernie Chan
